LOGIN_V2.INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Enbarter is an online skill-exchange platform, driven by the oldest form of doing business: bartering. A barter is a system of exchange where goods or services are directly exchanged for other goods or services without an intermediary medium of exchange, mainly money.
LOGIN_V2.TITLE: Log in to your account

ERRORS.EMAIL_MUST_VALID: Email must be a valid e-mail address
ERRORS.PASSWORD_MUST_VALID: Password must be at least 8 characters
